# Sample Documentation

This is sample markdown documentation for testing.

## Getting Started

To get started with the platform, follow these steps:

1. Sign up for an account
2. Verify your email
3. Log in to the dashboard

### System Requirements

- Node.js 20 or higher
- 2GB RAM minimum
- 10GB disk space

## Features

### Knowledge Base

Upload documents to build your knowledge base. The system supports:

- PDF files (up to 10MB)
- Markdown files
- Plain text files

### Chat Widget

Embed the chat widget on any website with a simple script tag.

## Configuration

All configuration is done through environment variables. See the README for the full list.

### API Keys

Create API keys in the admin panel. Each key can have allowed origins for security.

## Troubleshooting

If you encounter issues, check the server logs first.

Common issues:
- Missing environment variables
- Invalid API key
- CORS configuration
